title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Go library for downloading, building, and running large language models locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a built-in model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API—install with pip and chat with local models from any Python script or notebook.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as first-class LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama—manage models and chat in the browser.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama’s REST API with Spring-Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama servers—generate, chat, and pull models.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Rust-based CLI copilot that uses Ollama models for shell command suggestions and explanations.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators and embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub-Copilot alternative with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats and generates images using Ollama back-ends.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function-calling, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that containerizes and tests Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama providing GenServer behaviour and Phoenix LiveView components.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that embeds a chat interface backed by any Ollama model in a few lines of Python.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama with tokio support and strongly typed request/response models.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to provision Ollama servers on AWS, GCP, and Azure with GPU auto-selection.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repository tracking community SDKs for C#, Go, Swift, and Dart around the Ollama API.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting, and showcase of Ollama projects and models.
